overview: Made at S.U.N.Y. at Binghamton as a class exercise, filmmaker Saul Levine performs with students who each try to mimic his previously recorded phrase and then try to imitate each other imitating the recording.
tagline: On Bill Brand's visit to campus one summer, he recorded an experiment in sound with faculty member Saul Levine and two Binghamton students.
title: Cartoons: Before the Fact
